code: import React from'react';import API from'../utils/API';import{Card,CardText,CardBody,CardTitle,CardSubtitle,Button}from'reactstrap';function CardWeatherDetail(props){console.log('incoming CardWeatherDetail props: ',props);function handleSaveWeather(event){event.preventDefault();API.saveWeather({id:props.id,country:props.country,city:props.name,latitude:props.latitude,longitude:props.longitude,temp:props.temp,feelsLike:props.feelsLike,dateAdded:Date.now()});alert("Saved ".concat(props.name,"!"));}return React.createElement("div",null,React.createElement(Card,null,React.createElement(CardBody,null,React.createElement(CardTitle,null,"Weather Detail"),React.createElement(CardSubtitle,null,"Country: ",props.country),React.createElement(CardSubtitle,null,"City: ",props.name),React.createElement(CardText,null,"Temp: ",props.temp),React.createElement(CardText,null,"Feels Like: ",props.feelsLike),React.createElement(CardText,null,"Latitude: ",props.latitude),React.createElement(CardText,null,"Longitude: ",props.longitude)),React.createElement(Button,{onClick:handleSaveWeather},"Save this Weather Point")));};export default CardWeatherDetail;
